about.title: Who am I?
about.content: My name is Petar Stoyanov — actor, clown, director, and coach. For over 20 years, I've helped people from all walks of life — from performers to business leaders — unlock their voice, overcome stage fear, and connect deeply with themselves and their audience. My teaching is rooted in play, improvisation, breathwork, and body awareness. It's practical, fun, and truly transformative.
